ValidationRule.description: Concurrent Ops Deals should not have the Actual Off 600 MHz date entered until the station has moved to it's new channel. If the station has moved then change then remove the "Agreement Type" before entering the Actual Off 600 MHz date. - Deactivated 9/11
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Concurrent Ops Deals should not have the Actual Off 600 MHz date entered until the station has moved to it's new channel. If the station has moved then change then remove the "Agreement Type" before entering the Actual Off 600 MHz date.
